byline.contributor: Noah Remnick and Liam Stack contributed reporting.

abstract: Jasmine Gonzalez of the Bronx is found stabbed to death in Bronx River Park; Khiry Borden, victim's ex-boyfriend, is arrested on several charges, including murder.
lead_paragraph: Jasmine Gonzalez, 22, suffered multiple stab wounds to her torso, the police said. Her ex-boyfriend Khiry Borden, 25, was arrested on charges of murder, manslaughter and criminal possession of a weapon.

headline.main: Woman Found Stabbed to Death in Bronx Park; Ex-Boyfriend Is Charged
headline.print_headline: Woman Is Found Stabbed to Death in a Bronx Park

snippet: Jasmine Gonzalez, 22, suffered multiple stab wounds to her torso, the police said. Her ex-boyfriend Khiry Borden, 25, was arrested on charges of murder, manslaughter and criminal possession of a weapon.
